title.narrative: The institute for Justice and Reconciliation-Promoting a vibrant democracy in South Africa through enabling young persons active citizenship

description.narrative: This project aims at creating best practices pilot projects to illustrate the use of inclusive platforms to enable ordinary citizens to engage with political systems in South Africa and also to encourage good governance and to promote access to informatio n. The beneficiaries of this project will be community leaders youth civil society organisation and the broader public in Cape Town JHB Pretoria Durban Vryheid Worcester Warrenton and Grahamstown. Outcomes improved and diversified access to information.Th e skills and knowledge transfer related to the model will enable young people community leaders and other to promote reconciliation and justice- building work independent of the IJR once it has completed its interventions
